TopicTitle: Game crashing constantly about every 10 minutes into play

Articles.Content: Game crashes every few minutes into play. Only mod Downloaded is Mechjeb. I can paste the crash files but I dont really know what is important out of them and what is not and there is a lot in there.

I know you said your only mod is mechjeb. But you might still be crashing because of exceeding the 32bit memory limit. Can you post:

Your operating system + whether or not it is 32 bit or 64 bit?

Tell us if you use 64bit Kerbal Space Program or 32 bit? This will be different from your operating systems 'bittage', of course.

Can you tell us through the task manager what your games memory usage is after 7-8 minutes of active playtime?

And finally, are you aware of the temperature gauge memory leak, and have you taken steps to alleviate that?
It's probably caused by the temp gauge leak (will be fixed in 1.0.3)... Are any parts overheating before your game crashes?
